intent_atoms.description: Contextual status chips now surface across outline rows and the detail inspector.
VoiceOver regression pass for accessibility shortcuts must confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.
Real‑world assets such as Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG‑H fixtures are required to shift regression baselines from synthetic payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.

functional_units.name: Contextual Status Labels
functional_units.description: Displays contextual status chips across outline rows and the detail inspector

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Accessibility Shortcuts Verification
functional_units.description: Verifies that focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware
